mapper.update: update rule_engine_rule rule set rule.status=1 where rule.status = 2 and rule.id in (select rri.id from (select rer.id from rule_engine_rule rer, rule_engine_condition_group recg, rule_engine_condition_group_condition recgc where rer.deleted = 0 and recg.deleted = 0 and recgc.deleted = 0 and rer.id = recg.rule_id and recg.id = recgc.condition_group_id and recgc.condition_id = #{conditionId}) as rri);
